DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Ticagrelor increases the Adenosin induced coronary blood flow velocity.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Effect of Ticagrelor on Coronary Blood Flow in Healthy Male Subjects.
DOC.criteria: Suitable for ECG recording of CBFV and have no adverse reaction to adenosine challenge Have a body mass index between 18 and 30 kg/m2 History of clinically significant disease or disorder. Abnormal vital signs
